recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.description:
1. Put the Milk into a bowl
2. Add the eggs to the milk and stir until fully mixed
3. Add Flour bit by bit and keep stirring with a whiskk
4. Once the batter is semi-viscous, prepare a pan and preheat it.
5. Melt a bit of butter in the pan and then add one scoop of butter and spread across the whole pan.
6. Fry for about 30 seconds, then flip the pancake.
7. If both sides are golden brown, ready to eat!
8. Add some Apple sauce on top and you got original German pancakes!

recipes.title: Sukiyaki
recipes.ingredients: sukiyaki sauce, vegetables, noodles, sukiyaki meat
recipes.description:
1. Boil water
2. Mix in the sauce
3. Put in vegetables
4. Put in meat
5. done!

recipes.title: Rob's famous cereal
recipes.ingredients: a bunch of milk, a bunch of cereal
recipes.description:
1. Firstly you need to take some milk out of the fridge
2. Put the cereal in the bowl first! IMPORTANT
3. If you put the milk in first, please jump out of your window
4. Put milk in AFTER cereal
5. WIN!
